website_summaries.verdict: Used by fitness buffs looking to improve their abdominal workouts.
pros: Great for those who are in tune with their workouts already and know what muscle groups to target
Customers note the product's images accurately represent how it appears in real life
Noted for its ease of cleaning as well
cons: May run long in length for some to find fully effective

customer_reviews.title: I’m liking it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This works! I have religiously done sit-ups as a daily personal exercise for a very long time and thought all was as it would always be. I got this thing, which is well made, professional in look and feel, and found out there were things to learn in sit-up land. This device positions and supports you, and ever so slightly changes the pre-rep positioning and adds a bit of stretch, increasing the rep work load. More importantly it changes the yield of the time spent exercising. There has been a significant strength and definition enhancement using this mat. I like it a lot. I recommend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. It's a simple idea but it is effective. If you pay attention to you're body during regular crunches and then when you use this you will feel the difference. You feel additional muscles working than without it. It has definitely helped strenthen my core. I chose this particular one over the others offered on Amazon because this one was an inch higher. Glad I did. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: suedeky14

customer_reviews.title: Decent, I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, the thickness is good, cover is made of good material that I believe will last a long time. I would give 5 stars except when I opened it it appeared to be stuffed with fairly cheap foam, something you would find in a shipping box... seems like over time it will probably wear down and not maintain it's rigidity. So just seems a bit cheap in the guts. But I could be wrong, time will tell. Overall I'm happy with it and will use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Tried will not be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I have a big problem on my back, I actually have a Sciatic nerve problem, Last week and this week was acting up really bad. But with my Adb Mat, I did 200 abbs all last week and today, I have the pain if I don't exercise and I the pain if I do, so after I finish I fill better and actually less pain, I go to the gym 3 hours 4 days a week and my routines are hard no syssy staff, I am not a pro but my routines are extensive and tiresome, Tried the mat is good.
customer_reviews.author: pigi

customer_reviews.title: Solid abdominal mat!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of the mat. I've tried a few different brands and even styles on these and this definitely ranks with the Brand Name versions in regards to quality, performance, and durability. I put it to regular use and it only has minimal wear - even with using it on abrasive flooring. Good brand and good product - I will definitely feel confident buying more of their products based off this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mauk

customer_reviews.title: Comfort when doing stretching
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It saves my knees when I do stretches using the wall. The surface grips enough to use as a yoga block when I do side twists. Best purchase and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Mraven

customer_reviews.title: Painful situps but worth it..
customer_reviews.text: This is rock solid little simple device for stretching my back. For me, it's too much to do situps with but with some practice I'm able to do some situps without pain.. it take practice.
customer_reviews.author: DreamRider

customer_reviews.title: Firm, well-made and non-skid
customer_reviews.text: Firm and non-skid, the abdominal mat is as described and I'm very satisfied with it. As I've aged I have much greater propensity for lower back pain when working abdominals and leg curls. This isn't a cure, but it really provides support where I need it and the fact that it doesn't slide when using it on my exercise mat or bench is great.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund L. Stelmach

customer_reviews.title: Great support while giving comfort
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ab mat. It gives me great support on my lower back with doing ab work. It’s also improve my lower back issues since I’ve started using this. I use the ones at my CrossFit gym but at home, I had nothing. And just doing them without support would cause my lower back to hurt and even spasm. I have no complaints. I even use it just to stretch my back as well. I highly recommend this ab mat. It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MariaM_80

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Durable. Works.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It isolates the abdominals and prevents hip use. We use a ab mat similar to this at the crossfit gym I am a member of. This may be a simple piece of equipment but the results are real. I use this out on my patio before my morning run. Durable cushion/mat. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Woollens

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Great for the back.
customer_reviews.text: Solid product! Well made. My trainer uses it so I bought one. Great on my back. I take it to the gym with me when I’m not being trained by the pros. Love it! I’ve noticed a huge difference in my core strength and firmness. Now I just need to lose 5% body fat so I can see my ripped abs under there. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mackison

customer_reviews.title: Should have went rogue
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I like Rogue way better. The Rogue shape is better and it doesn’t seem to slide around as much.
customer_reviews.author: B Devine

customer_reviews.title: TRUST U NEED THIS!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I found on Amazon! A must have. No more back pain while doing crunches and you can do way more with this. #1 in my book. If I could give this 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ayling

customer_reviews.title: Great ab mat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a ton of AB mats and this is definitely one of the best quality. Would have paid more for this quality!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kanamine

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Solid Abmat. There are so many out there at a range of prices it can be hard to choose. This one has worked out well, sees use 4 to 5 times a week and has held up well. Little stiff at first but has worked it great in just a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality abdominal mat. Does not slip away during workout. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: QUEBECK

customer_reviews.title: All around good AB support
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Gives plenty of support while doing sit ups and crunches without being uncomfortable. Would buy again and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I lost it in my last move but i liked it so i will beordering again
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together, however...I only use it 2 to 3 days a week so if you use it everyday I can’t speak to how long it’ll last but mine is holding up well and I’m glad I bough it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Am able to do more sit-ups more comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around for a while and glad I chose this one. Arrived crazy fast. Does the job and super high quality. Doesn't slip.
customer_reviews.author: Rider

customer_reviews.title: I like the support and optimal abdominal activation this pad gives ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the support and optimal abdominal activation this pad gives for maximum ab workouts. I never realized how much more of a difference boosting one's back arch makes for ab muscle work. Also, I sense the pad will give me multi-purpose pad support for knees, etcetera. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'7" and it seems like it's too long for my torso
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used the AbMat and this mat seems a little longer. I'm 5'7" and it seems like it's too long for my torso.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Exactly what I was hoping for. I like the material texture. Helps keep it in place on rubber flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Corn Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: So far so good it came in time works as it should and it will be used when I need it to work got to have those ab workouts when its tough to make time for a gym membership
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Franco

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for my crossfit workouts! Not pleased that I received the mat with a corner that the seams were not stitched together. Other than that, it's firm enough and doesn't slide around too much!
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: I hate crunches... but this mat is a life saver. Works great, and helps not to make my back stick to the floor mats...
customer_reviews.author: Phil Redburn

customer_reviews.title: The item is well made and durable. My only ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is well made and durable. My only issue is that it is thicker than I thought it would be so it doesn't really fit my body right.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Gives great support for sit-ups
customer_reviews.text: Gives great support for sit-ups, scissor kicks, and any movement or exercise that uses those lower back muscles and abs.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla V. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints. Product came when it said it would. Seems to be built with good material.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stucker

customer_reviews.title: Great ABMAT
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable abmat. The carbon fiber look is a nice touch, too. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: AStiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect abdominal mat
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this mat after going back to his regular gym after a year of cross fit. He said this mat is perfect! Definitely a great purchase and does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Voigt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but very dense core foam
customer_reviews.text: Mat appears to be good quality. Much denser than the mats I have used previously. Makes it hard to keep feet on the ground. May break in over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but very firm and not comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: This pad is very hard. I’ve been using abdominal mats for years and did not expect this to be so firm. I cannot use this when doing sit-ups in a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ab may does do its job however is not nearly as comfortable as the rouge ones. Just spend the extra $15 and buy a rouge one.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: To hard and not flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is to hard to use! It hurts my back!
customer_reviews.author: G W

customer_reviews.title: I liked that the padding insert can be replaced if nesessary
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the padding insert can be replaced if nesessary. The least thing I liked about it was the foam insert could be made of a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cesare

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.text: it was a birthday gift for a close friend and he was ecstatic, just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Love the material very sturdy and able to clean easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in earlier that expected. Love the material very sturdy and able to clean easy and most of all it does work on the abs. Abs felt sore for days :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Abs
customer_reviews.text: Great workout tool. This product is simple, durable and hits the right spot during ab work.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Ab Mat is lightweight, fits in my gym bag and is easy to carry around. Great value product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just as good as any Rouge Ab mat for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Quality Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Well built product! Good construction, nice leather. Quality for a fair price. And fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: found a whole on it oh well , but other than that it is really helpful
customer_reviews.author: Dalisha

customer_reviews.title: Just the right fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height and firmness! It keeps me as comfortable as possible during long workouts with abs involved!
customer_reviews.author: hank parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Would recommend to others. Dont need to spend extra $$$ on ABmat brand.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my lower back and helps me hit my lower abdominals without sacrificing posture.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Steademan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Priced just right and just as good if not better than brands asking twice as much !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy mat, exactly as described. Perfect for anyone wanting to add a little more to their routine without spending big money for a treadmill/rowing machine/coat rack. You will not be disappointed with this thing
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

product_meta.title: Iron Bull Strength Abdominal Mat for Full Range of Motion Crunches - Exercise Ab Mat - Sit Up Support Pad - Abdominal Trainer
product_meta.description:
Maximize your results with our pro abdominal mat

The new Iron Bull Strength's exercise ab mat has been designed to work the entire abdominal muscles by allowing a full range of motion during any abs exercise. Our unique contoured design is the perfect height to support your lower back, allow a full stretch of the core muscles and execute a maximum contraction on every rep. 

Who can benefit from using a abmat?

If you're serious about building strong and defined abs, using our exercise mat will ensure your abs perform the way they should by allowing a full range of motion and leaving out other assisting muscles like you low back and hip muscles.

Main Features:

-Ergonomic Contoured Design

-Non-Slip Heavy Duty PU Vinyl Material

-High Density Foam Core

-Curved shape mimics the curve of your spine

-Safe, light and portable to workout anywhere

Built tough for your workouts, the abdominal mat ab trainer is durable, effective and fully portable and will last many years of usage and give you the results you want.

Click on the Yellow "Add to Cart" button above Now to MAXIMIZE your ab training and experience the RESULTS you deserve.
feature_bullets: PERFECT DESIGN: Our Premium Abdominal Mat works the entire abdominal muscles by allowing a full range of motion during any abs exercise. Our unique contoured design is the perfect height to support your lower back, allow a full stretch of the core muscles and execute a maximum contraction on every rep.

FOCUS ON YOUR 6 PACK: Our exercise mat provides complete isolation of your ab muscles during crunches, leg lifts and sit-ups. The ergonomic contoured design aligns your body perfectly to maximize abdominal contraction while leaving out other muscles such as your lower back or hip flexors thus making this your most effective ab workout that you can use anywhere, anytime.

HIGH DENSITY FOAM CORE: Our ab mat uses a high density foam core providing perfect stability and constant tension during any movement. We made sure to use a special density foam to get the perfect “not too soft, not too hard” feeling for maximum comfort and performance.

PREMIUM QUALITY: Our abdominal mat has been designed to outlast every other cheaper mats on the market using heavy duty PU vinyl material, double stitching all around and high density foam instead of other cheaper materials.

STABLE AND SAFE: Use our ab mat for a variety of exercises that isolate upper and/or lower abs as well as the oblique’s and lower back muscles without worrying about injuring yourself or recruiting the wrong muscles. You simply won’t get the same results without our abdominal mat.
